content: wyif p1* repeat 13 15 17 times sl1 wyif p2tog turn enjoy repeat row 3 & 4 another 11 13 15 times more row 5 rs sl1 wyib k26 30 34 ssk you should have 29 33 37 st for the sole at this point now you are going to start working in the round again row 6 continue working the instep sts in pattern as before you started working the heel k2tog k to end of sole sts leg next round continue working the ribbed lace pattern for the instep sts until you finish one repeat of lace pattern k all sole sts when starting a new pattern repeat work all 56 64 72 sts in pattern both instep that now are the front of the leg and sole sts that now are the back of the leg work in pattern until piece measures 2 5 cm 1 less than desired length 4 flawless socks | 01 | copyright 2019 sambaknits | sambaknits@gmail com flawless socks 5 flawless socks | 01 | copyright 2019 sambaknits | sambaknits@gmail com
